_sText:
It's a night at the museum!
=========================== This is another version of my __zm _exhibit___ map. Changes made: *Night time (duhhhh) *Better/ more cade spots *Added **laser** room!!!!! *Better places to camp in general... so it should be a bit easier for the humans *Even **MORE** secrets! Good luck finding them all :D *Still include a secret song by **ME**! It's a beautiful masterpiece, if you can find it.
Big map, variety of cade spots and spots that require teamwork.

8/28/11 UPDATE:
New bsp is zm_exhibit_night_2F
Changes: balanced some spots a little, added path from alley to parking garage for easier access, changed laser room up a bit, added more secrets, some more details, some more custom textures, players can no longer jump onto the lamps from the secret billboard

==UPDATED 12-2-2011==

Minor balance tweaking (in favor of humans)

Lamp posts are no longer clipped

May or may not have added a new secret...

Props should no longer be glitchable
